main event: A high-ranking government executive reported seeing an illuminated object performing erratic maneuvers in Zuni, New Mexico on October 14, 1952.
interesting points: The object had two flashing red lights above its main body., The executive estimated the object's diameter to be about 25 to 30 feet., The sighting lasted for approximately 40 minutes., The object was seen from an airplane and was identified as possibly being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., The source of the report is highly credible as the observer held a government position and was also a pilot.
sighted object: illuminated object with flashing red lights
